TextView.android:text: To be unconditionally admitted to complete UCC undergraduate programmes, Individuals should possess a minimum of five (5) subjects at the GCE or CSEC level at grades A, B, C or 1, 2, 3 respectively. CSEC pass at level 3 must have been obtained since 1998. candidates who have a minimum of 4 CXC's can also apply pending the outstanding CXC subjects or can opt to do UCC replacement courses Core Mathematics, English for Academic Purpose and Fundamentals of Accounting I.
